Package Server.Utilities

Class UserAuthentication

java.lang.Object
Server.Utilities.UserAuthentication
public class UserAuthentication
extends java.lang.Object
Contains helper methods for validating a session token, issuing a new session token, and hashing a value (for creating a new user, and checking a provided password hash)

    UserAuthentication()

      public UserAuthentication()

  • Method Details

    • extractUserIDFromToken

      public static int extractUserIDFromToken​(java.lang.String token)
      Gets the user id of the person to whom the access token was issued
      Parameters:
      token - the token to extract the userID from
      Returns:
      an int that is an exact match for the database userID or -1 if the token is expired or invalid

    • isValidSessionToken

      public static int isValidSessionToken​(java.lang.String token)
      Checks if the provided token is valid
      Parameters:
      token - the token to check
      Returns:
      the userID of the user who requested the token or -1 if it is invalid

    • generateSessionToken

      public static java.lang.String generateSessionToken​(int userid)
      Generates a session token and stores it for validation
      Parameters:
      userid - the username of the user requesting the token
      Returns:
      an access token

    • getSalt

      public static java.lang.String getSalt() throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Generates a salt value
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

    • generateHash

      public static java.lang.String generateHash​(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String salt) throws java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException, java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
      Generates a hash using the provided values
      Parameters:
      password - the value to hash
      salt - the salt to keep it cryptographically secure
      Returns:
      returns the resulting hash
      Throws:
      java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

    • compareHashes

      public static boolean compareHashes​(java.lang.String hashA, java.lang.String hashB)
      Compares two hashs
      Parameters:
      hashA - the first hash to compare
      hashB - the second hash to compare
      Returns:
      true if the hashes match, false otherwise

    • invalidateSessionToken

      public static void invalidateSessionToken​(java.lang.String token)
      Removes the user's token from the list of active sessions Will also remove any expired tokens from the list.
      Parameters:
      token - the access token to invalidate

    • listusers

      public static java.lang.String listusers()
